alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Kershaw (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 2:12PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Fairfield, northeastern Richland and southwestern Kershaw Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 211 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Carolina, or 8 miles northeast of Dentsville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Camden, Lake Wateree Dam, Dentsville, Lugoff, Sesquicentennial State Park, Lake Carolina, Villages at Sandhill, Longtown, Elgin, Goodale State Park, Killian, Lake Wateree State Park, Blythewood, Ridgeway, North Towne Square Shopping Center, Fort Jackson McCrady Training Center, Pine Grove Fire Station, Smallwood and Woodward Airfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 77 and 101. Interstate 77 between mile markers 19 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
